posts.post_content:
Posted By: Bruce Dorskind


Rare Type  Cards  For Sale


We have recently enjoyed some success in the auction world.
Accordingly, we have had the opportunity to upgrade a number of rare
type cards.   We have the following cards available for sale or trade.

We would be happy to send you scans of any cards which pique your interest.
Please feel free to e mail us with any questions.

We appreciate your time, and look forward to hearing from you.

Bruce Dorskind
America’s Toughest Want List
bdorskind@dorskindgroup.com

Posted By: Bruce Dorskind


We have received a number of inquiries with regard to discounts
on multiple purchasers.

Whilst we believe we are at our below market price on many of
these items,  we will offer a 10% discount to any buyer spending
$2000 or more with us.

We pay all shipping, handling and insurance costs.

Will consider an offer for the entire lot.


Please continue to write to 


Bruce Dorskind
America's Toughest Want List
bdorskind@dorskindGroup.com

Posted By: Bruce Dorskind
Our computer was down

If you recently requested scans,
please e-mail us again at

bdorskind@dorskindgroup.com

Posted By: Bruce Dorskind


We have received several trade inquires and a few cash offers
but have not found any that met the needs of both parties.

Accordingly, we invite you to write with your best offer and/or
we can send you a scan.

We are working on a major transaction and would love to move
the cards this week.

Please write in confidence to


Bruce Dorskind
bdorskind@dorskindgroup.com
